name: statusify
description: A library connecting status platforms into a single glorious integration

scripts.setup:react: yarn build && (cd packages/core && yarn link) && (cd ../../packages/uptimerobot && yarn link @statusify/core && yarn link) && (cd ../../packages/react && yarn link @statusify/core && yarn link @statusify/uptimerobot)
scripts.build: yarn clean:build && tsc -b packages/core packages/loki packages/uptimerobot
scripts.dev: yarn clean:build && tsc --watch -b packages/core packages/loki packages/uptimerobot
